blogPost.excerpt: After more than 150,000 happy customers on the Mac App Store, MeetInOne - the all-in-one Google Meet desktop app - is finally coming to the Windows Store. Get the app now & enjoy a 50% discount on our one-time pricing. The discount is valid until next Sunday.
blogPost.body: After more than 150,000 happy customers on the Mac App Store, MeetInOne - the all-in-one Google Meet desktop app - is finally coming to the Windows Store. Get the app now & enjoy a 50% discount on our one-time pricing. The discount is valid until next Sunday.
blogPost.title: MeetInOne - The all-in-one Google Meet desktop app for Windows
blogPost.author: Tim 👋🏻

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上拥有超过15万名满意的用户之后，MeetInOne--这个集所有功能于一身的Google Meet桌面应用--终于来到了Windows Store。现在就获取该应用，并享受一次性价格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下周日。
localize.tagline: 适用于Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面应用。

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上擁有超過15萬名滿意的用戶之後，MeetInOne--這個集所有功能於一身的Google Meet桌面應用--終於來到了Windows Store。現在就獲取該應用，並享受一次性價格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下週日。
localize.tagline: 適用於Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面應用。

previous.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
previous.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link

localize.description: 连续的视频电话让你压力山大？在进入通话前加入2分钟的引导式音频冥想，给自己（以及参加下次会议的所有人）一个暂停的机会。无论您使用什么视频软件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何视频链接中添加一个2分钟的冥想引导。

localize.description: 連續的視頻電話讓你壓力山大？在進入通話前加入2分鐘的引導式音頻冥想，給自己（以及參加下次會議的所有人）一個暫停的機會。無論您使用什麼視頻軟件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何視頻鏈接中添加一個2分鐘的冥想引導。

next.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. What’s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - it’s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
next.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!

localize.description: 设计是一个不断变化的环境。今天很酷的东西，明天就会过时。所以设计师必须时刻保持警惕，这是一个相当忙碌的工作。而这正是Yizy发挥作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 给你的截屏和书签赋予意义!

localize.description: 設計是一個不斷變化的環境。今天很酷的東西，明天就會過時。所以設計師必須時刻保持警惕，這是一個相當忙碌的工作。而這正是Yizy發揮作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 給你的截屏和書籤賦予意義!
